lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist made 30 saves in posting his second straight preseason shutout, and Adam Hall’s late second-period goal was the difference in the Rangers’ 1-0 victory over the Boston Bruins at Madison Square Garden last night.
snippet: Henrik Lundqvist made 30 saves in posting his second straight preseason shutout, and Adam Hall’s late second-period goal was the difference in the Rangers’ 1-0 victory over the Boston Bruins at Madison Square Garden last night.
